description: Collection of data transfer objects for JobExecution entities

___jobExecutionDtos.description: List of DTOs for execution jobs

$eref.description: Job Execution data transfer object Schema

___status.description: Current status of the job execution

___total.description: Total number of records to be processed

___completedDate.description: Date and time when the job execution completed

___runBy.description: First and last name of the user that triggered the job execution

___uiStatus.description: Status that is rendered on UI

___startedDate.description: Date and time when the job execution started
